tool_description: Optimizes safety stock levels by balancing holding costs against stockout risks, considering demand and supply uncertainty.

product_sku.description: Product SKU to optimize safety stock for

lead_time_std_dev.description: Standard deviation of lead time in days

stockout_cost_per_unit.description: Cost per unit of stockout (lost sales, backorder costs)

error_messages: Invalid demand parameters: demand_mean must be positive, demand_std_dev must be non-negative.
Invalid lead time parameters: lead_time_mean must be positive, lead_time_std_dev must be non-negative.
Invalid cost parameters: holding_cost_per_unit and stockout_cost_per_unit must be positive.
Invalid service level: target_service_level must be between 0.85 and 0.99.
usage: Provide product_sku, demand and lead time statistics, cost parameters, and target_service_level to calculate optimal safety stock level.

annual_holding_cost.description: Expected annual holding cost for this safety stock level

achieved_service_level.description: Actual service level achieved with optimal safety stock
